name: Kids Land
description:
Diversified, easy-to-play and short-lived mini-games, suitable for children who are new to computers or for parents who accompany their children to play together. If you are a veteran player who has been playing games for many years, you are welcome to play it. It may remind you of the happy times when you first came into contact with games.

The game level time is all 60 seconds, making it easier for you to manage the time you play with your children.
The current game levels are:

1. Balloon Shooting
2. Catch the treasure
3. Addition learning
4. Subtraction learning
5. Memory pairing
6. Space fighter
